subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps is following up his record performance at the Beijing Olympics by changing some of the technique that carried him to eight gold medals. As he shifts his focus on shorter races, he hopes a new freestyle technique will increase his sprinting speed.
